name: Murder Mystery (Ahmad Al Shehabi)
description:
Murder Mystery is a short puzzle game about uncovering the murder that happened in FFC. A company that develops body and facial modification technologies. 

This game was developed by:

Programming:
Ahmad Al Shehabi
Sebastian Lindfors https://itch.io/profile/sebastian-lindfors 

2D and artwork:
Carl Daag
Jessica Algotsson https://www.instagram.com/pupper_punch/ 

3D modelling:
Nima Shirazi

Audio:
Ahmad Al Shehabi
